text:
:wave: Everyone, I’m Siddharth Garg and I am the co-founder of <https://cloudfilesapp.co/|CloudFiles>. We are currently a part of the HubSpot’s App Accelerator program and are developing a HubSpot App that would allow you to upload files from within your deal, company, and contact records. It generates a shareable link for the file. You can set security settings, connect workflows and get  page-by-page analytics. It is an enhancement over the HubSpot Documents tool.

We are looking for some feedback on our app. We have c<https://viewer.cloudfilesapp.co/6f7a8817a42d26a49e53d641485f42e7|reated this 1-pager here> that includes some more information and demo videos on the app. There is also a link to a feedback survey on the page, if you could help us out by filling that in and providing some feedback, we would really appreciate it. I am also happy to answer any questions in a thread on this message as well. Thanks!
